a.content: They make vertical compositions. (b -> a) . (a -> x) = b -> x If you know more, please contribute.

q.content: Yoneda embedding can be used to embed an arbitrary functor category [C, D] in the functor category [[C, D], Set]. Figure out how it works on morphisms (which in this case are natural transformations).

path: answers-db/books/Category Theory For Programmers/16. Yoneda Embedding/5
